name: Ghost-branded generic excess spend
title: Ghost-branded generic excess spend as a percentage of all generic spending
description: Excess spend on ghost-branded generics (more info) as a percentage of all spending on generics
why_it_matters: When an item is prescribed generically, the dispenser is reimbursed at the price in the Drug Tariff; but when a manufacturer is stated, the reimbursement price is usually more expensive. A list of products which have been prescribed as ghost-generics is available on every CCG and Practice dashboard page. Read more in our FAQ and our blog.
